title: The beautiful island country that's 29C in January and is a direct flight from London | Travel News | Travel | Express.co.uk
text:
Barbados stays warm in the winter and is just a direct flight away from London. (Image: GETTY) Many travellers will be looking to escape the cold January nights after the New Year with the hope of catching some winter sun.
This beautiful Caribbean island is a top tourist destination, although many might not think to travel there in the dead of winter.
With direct flights from London, Barbados makes for a perfect January getaway to escape the after-Christmas blues.
Sometimes referred to as the Pearl of the Caribbean, this enchanting island is great for snorkelling, nightlife or just relaxing on the beach with a book.
But perhaps one of Barbados’s best features is its warm temperature year round. With an average high of 29C in January, it’s sure to offer an instant respite from the cold travellers from the UK and Europe.

Stunning coral reefs ring parts of the island and amazing aquatic animals can be found on Barbados. (Image: GETTY) In addition, tourists are almost guaranteed sunny weather in January after the country’s rainy season is long gone.
Holidaymakers will have their pick of luxury resorts, white sandy beaches and coral reefs to scuba dive or snorkel.
The east coast of the island tends to exhibit rougher, Atlantic qualities while the west coast is home to serene Caribbean beaches.
The rougher waters around Bathsheba Beach call to surfers and tourists looking for a beautiful beach holiday often flock to the area around Hastings.

Miami Beach, Dover Beach and Rockley Beach on the southwest coast are also popular beach hangouts.
Hurricane season coincides with the rainy season - June to November - meaning visitors coming to the island in January won’t have to worry about the severe weather which can affect the region.
While the flight to Barbados from the UK is a long haul - just under nine hours from London - it is direct meaning tourists can make a beeline straight for the sun.
With hot weather , friendly people and beautiful beaches, Barbados is one of the top destinations to escape the winter this January.
